item.title: BMW E38 Ultimate Sound System Revival
item.description: Intro The average E38 7 series as of now is older than 20 years. With 2 decades of time, parts wear and break down. This includes the audio hardware. The original speakers in the E38 are paper woofers that have undoubtedly all degraded by now. While it may be simple to buy the original replacements, it’s most likely not sensible as inventory diminishes and prices increase. Instead, a better way to tackle this is to moderinize the audio system with bigger and better components tha have modern features like Bluetooth.
item.dc:creator: SpiffyGoose
